amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 118-487 to prevent the final rule titled "Energy Conservation Program: Energy Conservation Standards for Distribution Transformers" from taking effect.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kelly (PA) amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 208 - 199 (Roll no. 182).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Kelly (PA) amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 208 - 199 (Roll no. 182).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
